General.Name: PO Valley Energy Ltd
General.Description: Po Valley Energy Limited operates as an oil and gas exploration and development company in the Po Valley Region, Italy. The company's project portfolio include the Teodorico project located in the shallow waters of the Adriatic Sea; and Torre del Moro gas/oil condensate and Ravizza/Bagnolo exploration licenses in Piano. Po Valley Energy Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Mt Pleasant, Australia.
General.Address: 7 The Esplanade, Mount Pleasant, WA, Australia, 6153
